mapper.select: select roomnum from roomreserv where roomnum=#{roomNum} and to_char(startdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') like #{startdate}
mapper.insert: insert into roomReserv values((select nvl(max(reservNumber)+1,1) from roomreserv),#{startdate},#{roomNum},#{reservstate})
mapper.update: update roomReserv set reservstate=concat(reservstate,#{reservstate}) where reservNumber=(select nvl(max(reservNumber),1) from roomreserv where roomNum=#{roomNum})
mapper.select: select mem.branchAddr1,rom.roomName,romp.branchName, to_char(paid_at,'yyyy-mm-dd') as paid_at,SUBSTR(reserveTime,0,4) as starttime, SUBSTR(reserveTime,LENGTH(reserveTime)-3) as endtime,status,receipt_url from roomPayment romp join room rom on rom.roomNum=romp.roomNum join member mem on romp.branchName=mem.branchName where romp.id=#{id}
